title: You know how i constantly bitch about bronze players?
body:
http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/136263408/201665539/eog

This is why.

oh and btw the ahri was like 7/0 before the laning phase was even over and she tended to romp around with vi so the only way for me to kill her was to survive vi ult dodge the charm in a split second after vi ult then one hit her.

Not an easy task as youd expect, if i dont pull that off i get one shot by the pair because of how fed my team made them.

meanwhile due to me having literally 10 of our 13 kills at the time when ahri had 7 kills it was impossible for my team to help me because they had the damage of a wet paper bag and the tankiness of a potato.

Not to mention the afk fucking sona.

And why the fuck did azir build nashors, its literally useless on him since soldiers cant proc it and they override his autos.

And in true rub the salt into the wound fashion the fed ahri knew damn well she had to shut me down, just as i knew i had to shut her down, so we were constantly seeking each other out.

The problem is i was doing it while shitting myself because i knew she had a team that was actually bloody useful (minus the trynd that i anally imploded during laning phase to the point it was basically a 4v5) where as my team was still trying to figure out how to kill intro bots.

Oh and the real kicker?

is when you look at the ranks of the players, their entire team except for vi? b5, vi being b4.

My team? the really crappy one?

Me b5, azir b5, xin b4, Sona b3.

And the real kicker, vayne b1.

Literally the only person who got close to keeping up with me and still fell short was vayne.

The fact that a player practically an entire tier above me played worse, should speak volumes.

And it also speaks volumes for the ahri.

But mostly it speaks volumes for the mmr system, and how fucking inaccurate it is, especially since dynamic queue came in.

Like frankly when i think bronze 5, i think tank ashe jg mains, teemo building tiamat, runaans huricane xin zhaos (ive actually seen that before, he built two of them, i wanted to neck myself), "you cant hit me because i used ghost so you cant see me"

I dont think players that know literally every ability in the game bar one or two.

I dont think players that can play off meta bullshit that should never work and still do fairly decent (manahoy gangplank never forghetti)

I dont think players that are lacking in maybe one or two skills

And most importantly, i dont think of low silver high bronze players who are unfortunate enough to not have 4 other friends that play consistently to queue with.

And before the skeptics jump in on me with a "but yellow you probably just had a good game" no, what you are looking at, is a game where i was a little tilted just a smidge but not enough to actually affect my play, that game was neither me in a motivated take on the world attitude where i go 20/0 fueled by good vibes, nor was it a "i just had 5 teams in a row with shit teams" tilt game, it was just normal yellow.

And thats how i play when im not tilted as fuck.

Unfortunately i dont have a replay to prove this since the timeline cant show this, but that trynd had the vi in his lane half the time to try and stop me destroying him, i still did it, so you cant even blame the trynd either since i practically 1v2'd my laning phase.

BUT if you watch the timeline you will notice something strange, after my first death to ahri i start to play more sloppily, im not getting as many kills, my deaths gradually get closer and closer together etc etc.

That is literally tilt, you can physically watch me get tilted during that game by reading the timeline.

replies.body: yea u lost cause u bought 2 life line items gg

shitson didnt even notice steraks was a lifeline passive.

Ive been buying steraks and maw for like a year now.

rip me.

Granted if id known steraks was lifeline (which is my bad) id have bought wits end for mr instead of maw.
i would of skipped steraks and just bought maw and get omens or lifesteal

its irelia, the 25% bonus base ad scales super well with the triforce (its base ad not bonus ad so it does infact boost sheen proc damage) and since tri is core on her it makes sense. also gives her much needed tank.
yea no. Just dont bother with irelia there are other champions are that better atm

"And why the fuck did azir build nashors, its literally useless on him since soldiers cant proc it and they override his autos."

stopped reading at that point. your 1 funny bloke!

for your enlightenment: http://champion.gg/champion/Azir
reason being azir scales so hard off attack speed and ap (name another item with more ap and AS) that the passive doesnt even need to be there, on the positive it gives him some damage between the times he has no soldiers available/they evade them.

but to be fair azir at bronze 5 sounds a bit sketchy, having a decently structured team really helps azir smash out teamfights and that doesnt often happen at b5 i assume

and then i started reading again (after editing out some stupid insults, by the time i finished writing this novel i feel we bonded=P)

"The fact that a player practically an entire tier above me played worse, should speak volumes."

you realize A. everyone has a bad game and B. if you are playing at the level you should be at then you'll win around 1/2 of your games. you may have just fell in the bad 1/2 that game, and i dont think theres that much diff between bronze 5 bronze 1 sept those special people in b5 that would be b10 if it existed =P

and as for tilt yea i suffer that problem myself, somedays i just have a really short fuse, best way is to only play 1-2 games at a time and do something like go for a walk or get your mind of it for 30mins or more (going to the pub worked wonders the other day! tho it lasted more than the planned 1 hour haha)

Yeah my main issue is im hella broke all the time so really my only source of chill is Smoke breaks and video games.

Which doesnt help when the source of my tilt is video games haha.

As for the azir nashors thing i can see how thatd work but i cant shake the fact that swapping the nashors for a more utility based ap item would be better, due to azir mainly being played as a burst mage, but thats just me.

Like protobelt or something instead of nashors would be amazing, proto in, soldier do that skill shot thing, with the right balance of ap and magic pen that should one shot most people.

Unfortunately i actually win less than half my games on an overall average, but thats more due to the short temper for unskilled players (or atleast people worse than myself) than anything, but if i have a good few days in a row where i dont tilt i average about a 70-80% winrate over my last 20 games so that should give an idea of where im at atm.

it actually gets super apparent if i only play on weekdays during school hours so all the younger kids are offline, my winrate skyrockets because i spend less time arguing with some 12 year old in chat, infact only reason i dont do that to elo climb is i enjoy ranked more than norms, that and life responsibilities get in the way.

>Yeah my main issue is im hella broke all the time so really my only source of chill is Smoke breaks and video games.

Get a job, stop playing video games and take responsibility for your life you pathetic fuck.

Saying get a job as a solution anything is legit stupid.

You dont choose to be unemployed (And frankly if you do you must be retarded because living off shit all food and not being able to do anything for fun is cancer) 

Reasons saying get a job is stupid.

I cant force employers to hire me.

Job market is pretty thin these days.

My last job was as a draftsman and unfortunately thats the only thing im experienced in and no one in that field is hiring atm.

Im too old to work fast food due to award rates.

I never did the whole mcdonalds thing i went straight into Draftsman work right out of highschool so i dont have the retail experience required to get hired at most retail places.

Would you like me to go on?

Granted judging by the cry of pathetic fuck, plus you are playing league, your account is a trump meme, im going to guess you are around 16 years old or so?

May i ask what you are doing with your life, because if i recall at your age i was appointed documentation editor for an entire fucking programming language.

Just so this doesnt get lost in the wall of text.

What im saying is Bronze 5 is both the default state, its where you are if you are mediocre or just straight up trash, no matter what you will end up in some division of bronze, you only escape bronze if you have friends to carry you out or are atleast a tier below your true mmr. 

And also the lowest possible state.

If you were to look at this in economic terms, itd be like saying everyone is poor as shit no matter what, and the only way to not be poor is to have a bunch of already rich friends, or to be ridiculously good at your job.

dude i just edited and re did my comment like 60 times i hope u didnt read it till its completed state lol

my smurf just hit 30 (main is only s3) and was gonna start playing some ranked with my bronze friend today later. if u wanna play add me. name is "SummonersDrift"

Ill add ya man, and nah i was busy making a kindred rage at me the entire game for feeding a sion early and laugh as my team slowly realises im 16/13 (i had a really bad lane phase) and kindred is 5/14 and start taking my side instead.

Edit: just added you btw.
Im watching that game right now. 10 minutes in and you are by far the weakest player in the game so far. Ill comment further later on but HOLY BATMAN you are bad so far

Comment 1 - Good lord. You are being slaughtered in lane and you are buying purely offensive items. Get some defense sweet fuck.

Comment 2 - 11:20 You just walked passed a ward, sat around taking enemy jungle while kindred was fighting nearby. help your bloody team mates

Comment 3. 12:00 Sion is pushed up to your tower and you walk up through river behind him? Walked directly into his Q and obviously got killed. What even the heck

Comment 4. 15:00 You keep picking fights that you just plain cannot win. Really, really bad decisions

17:00 yes go on. continue to ignore your bot lane that is getting fucked over. I guess getting krugs into irelia is more important than keeping ezreal alive. you got a double kill after coming in to clean up after they both died. But if you had gone much much earlier it could very easily have been triple kill for nothing

18:00 you suicided to get the tower kill. I do that a lot too, so fair play. BUT that process gave away a free dragon to them.

19:00 chased down a kill on sivir, completely oblivious to your mid tower getting smashed. worth? no. You then for some reason tried to 1v2 immediately after. No idea why.

My replay just crashed and i dont really wanna watch any more.
